concept.title: Elasticsearch
concept.shortdesc: The Elasticsearch destination writes data to an Elasticsearch cluster. It can also write to Elasticsearch Found clusters and Shield-enabled clusters. The Elasticsearch destination writes each record to Elasticsearch as a document.

conbody.p: Elasticsearch destinationoverviewdestinationsElasticsearchWhen you configure the Elasticsearch destination, you configure the cluster name, node URI, and document-related information.
When the shares the same network as the Elasticsearch cluster, you can enter one or more node URI and automatically detect additional Elasticsearch nodes on the cluster.
You can configure the destination to perform upserts. You can also add advanced Elasticsearch properties as needed.
